briefTitle: Preoperative Relaxation Training and Acupuncture to Minimize Perioperative Symptoms in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Entspannung Und Akupunktur Zur Reduktion Perioperativer Symptome Bei Brustkrebspatientinnen- Eine Randomisiert-kontrollierte Interventionsstudie im Kontext Einer Integrativ Onkologischen Versorgung (EARpeS)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria:

* clinically proven breast cancer with an indication for breast conserving surgery with max. 50% volume reduction
* physical and psychological ability to take part in relaxation training

Exclusion criteria:

* serious psychiatric disorder
* to time span to surgery shorter than 2 weeks or longer than 20 weeks
